content.rendered:
For high quality Traditional Hand Spray GRC / GFRC

The PS9000 and the PS10000 GRC / GFRC Spray Station series utilise the proven technology of durable rotor/stator progressive cavity pumps driven by tough 3-phase electric motors and reliable hydrostatic gearboxes. These have been developed for the traditional Hand Spray and Auto Spray processes where manufacturers need to produce at high outputs whilst maintaining consistency of quality.

  • The most popular, reliable and user-friendly spray stations available
  • Easily maneuverable
  • Easy manual or mechanical loading
  • Twin section control panel protected by waterproof cabinet
  • Supplied with Concentric Spray Gun (other spray heads available)
  • Removable sieve fitted to prevent blockages
  • Large wheels with articulated castors
  • Remote control
  • In line lubricator for smooth running of the chopper motor
  • Articulated spray support boom takes the weight off the spray man
  • Large 4-box capacity-roving tray
  • Transparent reinforced hose for added safety easy cleaning
